entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
